items.summary: On the Pond feed page route (/pond/$name), for desktop breakpoints (lg and up) remove the in-page "Feed" and "About" navigation tabs and keep the feed as the center column content.

On the Pond feed page route (/pond/$name), for desktop breakpoints (lg and up) replace the current generic RightSidebar discovery widgets with a pond-specific About sidebar that displays the same information currently shown in PondAboutPage (e.g., About This Pond, created date, member count, visibility, rules, tags, moderators, and join/leave actions as applicable).

On the Pond About route (/pond/$name/about), for desktop breakpoints (lg and up) remove the in-page "Feed" and "About" navigation tabs and avoid presenting redundant desktop-only navigation; ensure the desktop experience aligns with the new Reddit-style layout where the About content is presented in the right sidebar on the feed route.
